mapper.sql: id, name, datasource_id, status, notify_group_ids, notify_template, cron, code_content, arguments, remark, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag
e.id, e.name, e.datasource_id, e.status, e.notify_group_ids, e.notify_template, e.cron, e.code_content, e.arguments, e.remark, e.create_date, e.create_by, e.update_date, e.update_by, e.del_flag
mapper.select:
select ,d.name data_source_name from umc_custom_engine e left join umc_custom_datasource d on d.id=e.datasource_id where e.del_flag!=1 and d.del_flag!=1
AND e.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
mapper.insert: insert into umc_custom_engine (id, name, datasource_id, status, notify_group_ids, notify_template, cron, code_content, arguments, remark, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notifyGroupIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arguments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update umc_custom_engine
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datasource_id = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
notify_group_ids = #{notifyGroupIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notify_template = #{notifyTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
